original_text: ‘What the daughters of Zelophehad said is right. You must give to them some of the land that their father's family will receive. Give to them the land that their father would have received.
korean_text: 슬로브핫 딸들의 말이 옳으니 너는 반드시 그들의 아버지의 형제 중에서 그들에게 기업을 주어 받게 하되 그들의 아버지의 기업을 그들에게 돌릴지니라

sentences.original_text: What the daughters of Zelophehad said is right.
You must give to them some of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그들에게 땅의 일부를 주어야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: that their father's family will receive.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 아버지 가족이 받을 땅을 말입니다.

sentences.original_text: that their father would have received.
